[FirstNameNew]               Nameless;

[CharType]               human;
[Gender]               male;
[Desc]               <blue>You are Buster Matthews, a fifty-something nobody from Arkansas. In your prime, you've been plenty of things. A soldier, an officer, a handyman, and most recently, an exterminator. Sadly, a busted knee prevented you from achieving other goals of yours, and you have gained a good 65 pounds during your recovery. You've entered the show for both the promise of money and the promise of a change. "Change Your Life- For Better or Worse!", huh? Well, it can't get any worse than this.</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>The man once known as Buster Matthews is now gone. Now there is a worker bee-girl in his place, buzzing around nervously with its sister bee who used to be a gameshow host. All of a sudden, another man walks on stage to the endless cheers of the audience. He talks about a "double bill", and "host is history", and other things that the two bees fail to understand, before unveiling a bouquet of flowers outside the set, in which the two bees understand fully.

Eventually, the second bee becomes strong and assertive enough to be a queen, and the remaining worker sets out in search of flowers. The resulting honey has strange attributes, as reports come up about people abruptly leaving their homes, following a scent, and never returning. Soon the worker bee once known as Buster Matthews has a colony full of identical worker bees, and "colony collapse disorder" becomes the least of the human's problems with bees...</pink>;
